Summon Commander:#931 Ivy King
The mage awakens an ancient Ivy King and persuades him to serve him. The Ivy King is an ancient and powerful Vine Ogre skilled in Nature magic. The Ivy Kings are served by Vine Men and they will arrive in greater numbers when called by an Ivy King.
